name: mantium
description: Mantium is an open-source, self-hosted note and idea organization tool. It features structured content editing, tagging, and search with a flexible block-based UI built for personal knowledge management.
features: Block-based editing: Organize notes using flexible blocks that can be rearranged and nested.
Tag management: Apply multiple tags to notes for cross-referencing and categorization.
Full-text search: Find notes quickly by searching through titles, content, and tags.
Markdown support: Write notes in Markdown with live preview and formatting options.
Hierarchical structure: Create nested note collections and folders for logical organization.
Link between notes: Create bidirectional links to connect related ideas and build knowledge graphs.
Version history: Track changes to notes over time with the ability to view and restore previous versions.
Export options: Download notes in Markdown, HTML, or plain text formats for portability.
Dark mode: Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable reading in any environment.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate and edit notes efficiently with customizable keyboard commands.
Attachment support: Add images, files, and documents to notes for comprehensive information storage.
Privacy focused: Self-hosted solution ensures your personal knowledge base remains private.
